title: Why AI Needs Structure Before Scale
excerpt: Scalability starts with architecture, not GPUs.
content: Everyone is racing to scale their AI, but most are missing the foundational architecture. True scalability in AI isn't just about more GPUs; it's about structured data, asynchronous processing, and modular design.

title: Designing Multi-Tenant Systems That Don’t Break
excerpt: Decoupling data and domain logic for long-term scalability.
content: The choice between a shared database, sharding, or database-per-tenant has cascading consequences for cost, performance, and security. Here's how to make the right decision.
